name: Wordbullet
description:
Take Word, or take Action? A text-based ancient-egyptian life simulation with a twist. What did I do with the limitation? My intention was to make it a combination of text-adventure and a first-person shooter game since these two conflict with each other. One purely relies on text while the other is mostly action and is full of flashy guns.

** The game might be buggy at some points so sorry in advance, I'll try to fix them and I'll be updating the game during voting.**

Creator's Experience:

Thank the game dev gods I submitted. This is is my 3rd jam ever and the shortest one I've had. I'm definitely not the first one to make a game with a shooting text gameplay, I took inspiration from the class trials in danganronpa where you literally slice and shoot the words. Also, I'm not at all familiar with text-based or fps games so I pretty much  just guessed how I would combine them all together. 

Note:

The game may suffer from lack of playtesting so if you've got any suggestions, questions or errors you encountered in the game, comment them below.
